ygData.subject: RE: News Flash On SoW
ygData.msgSnippet: Last knight - shaperson fiend says hi - I say hi - I go to run off and wtf? he sow d me  right click --  find druid with cancel magic  u
ygData.messageBody:
Last knight - shaperson fiend says hi - I say hi - I go to run off and wtf?
he sow'd me <grrr>

right click -- <grrrr>

find druid with cancel magic <smiles>

u can NOT right click it off u if u r not the caster.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 8:42 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] News Flash On SoW

From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>

Last night I was playing my Barbarian Shaman (who at level 9
can more often
than not drop yellow bugs/lions grizzlies *laughs*) and on I
whim I clicked
my SoW icon. *poof* it was gone. So, although I might have
been because I
was the caster, you might want to double check if that
didn't appear with
yesterdays downtime.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
